description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，原中华全国归国华侨联合会副主席，第七届、第八届全国政协委员。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Vice Chairman of the All-China Federation of Returned Overseas Chinese, and a member of the 7th and 8th National Committees of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 印度城市，徐发淦的出生地。
description.en: A city in India, birthplace of Xu Fagan.

nodes.id: 中华全国归国华侨联合会

zh-cn: 中华全国归国华侨联合会
en: All-China Federation of Returned Overseas Chinese

description.zh-cn: 由全国归国华侨、侨眷组成的全国性人民团体，徐发淦曾担任该组织副主席。
description.en: A national civic organization composed of returned overseas Chinese and their relatives from all over the country. Xu Fagan once served as its vice chairman.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国组织，徐发淦曾是其第七、八届委员。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference. Xu Fagan was a member of its 7th and 8th committees.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，通称中国。徐发淦是该国政治人物。
description.en: A country in East Asia, commonly known as China. Xu Fagan is a politician of this country.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的大学，徐发淦是其校友。
description.en: A university located in Beijing, China, of which Xu Fagan is an alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，徐发淦是其党员。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China, of which Xu Fagan is a member.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国省级行政区，徐发淦的籍贯地。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China, Xu Fagan's ancestral home.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省梅州市的市辖区，徐发淦的籍贯地。
description.en: A district of Meizhou City, Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China, Xu Fagan's ancestral home.

description.zh-cn: 徐发淦于1930年12月出生在印度加尔各答。
description.en: Xu Fagan was born in Kolkata, India in December 1930.

relationships.target: 中华全国归国华侨联合会

description.zh-cn: 徐发淦曾担任中华全国归国华侨联合会副主席。
description.en: Xu Fagan served as the Vice Chairman of the All-China Federation of Returned Overseas Chinese.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 徐发淦是第七届和第八届中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会委员。
description.en: Xu Fagan was a member of the 7th and 8th National Committees of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 徐发淦是中华人民共和国的一名政治人物。
description.en: Xu Fagan is a politician in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，徐发淦是北京师范大学的校友。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Xu Fagan is an alumnus of Beijing Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，徐发淦是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Xu Fagan is a member of the Communist Party of China.
